/* Jesus' life and teaching according to the New Testament */
NPOV is all fine and good, but the circumflexes over the vowels in the Aramaic transliteration represent phonemic consonants that have been quiesced into vowels. Restoring them, as per linguistics.
NPOV in first paragraph: specify the context in which the title "Christ" applies; use only neutral names without qualification
More precise scientific transliteration standards, in Unicode
standardized image markup and topic box
